eventDecorators.name: Confirmed
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

parameterDecorators.description: The address array for which transactions with a zero gas price must be denied.

functionDecorators.description: Returns a boolean flag indicating if the `initialize` function has been called.

parameterDecorators.description: The address for which the boolean flag must be determined.
